select
to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM') as date
, count(userid) as count from visitor where
regdate <= sysdate and regdate > sysdate - 7 to_char(regdate, 'YYYY') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')
group by
to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM')
